title: Why doesn't Tectonic have an Icon?
body: Every other OPL team has an Icon but Tectonic doesn't. Why is this? I really want to support my friend who is currently their mid laner.

replies.body: Sometimes team icons aren't all shipped at once, especially new ones as the art for them sometimes doesn't reach Riot until just before the splits start. I'll take a look at this tomorrow when I'm in the office and see if it is just a late development or if there is an issue in the store.
I asked my mate and he said he thinks it comes out next patch. Most probably is just a delay because they're a new team. Thank you for the reply <3

Yeah this is correct - it was a late icon submission but will be in a future patch!

Cheers
Why would you choose to support Tectonic, their support/top/adc are inters lol
Cause the mid laner Shok is my friend IRL
